name: Street Carnage
text: For you, the urban environment becomes another brutal weapon you can use to shred flesh and break bones.
prerequisites: Str 15, Improved Bull Rush, Improved Unarmed Strike, Power Attack, Street Style, Street Sweep, base attack bonus +8 or monk level 7th.
benefit: While using Street Style, the critical multiplier of your unarmed strikes becomes ×3, instead of ×2.
text_zh: 对你来说，城镇的街道也是可以削骨去肉的战斗利器。
prerequisites_zh: 力量 15，精通冲撞，精通徒手打击，猛力攻击，街霸流，街角霸王拳，BAB+8或武僧等级7级。
benefit_zh: 当你使用街霸流期间，徒手打击的重击倍率变为x3，以取代原本的x2。
